channel.title: opendns on Silviu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in opendns on Silviu's Blog

item.title: List of open dns servers
item.description: This is a growing list of Open DNS servers available around the world. I also maintain a list of ip address of various isp providers. Google Pubic DNS 8.8.8.8 8.8.4.4 OpenDNS **** 208.67.220.220 208.67.222.222. Open DNS also makes available a third and fourth dns server with identical service to the first two: 208.67.220.222 208.67.222.220 ScrubIT 67.138.54.100 207.225.209.66 Level 3 Communications 4.2.2.1 4.2.2.2 4.2.2.3 4.2.2.4 4.2.2.5 4.2.2.6 OpenNIC 58.6.115.42 (Queensland, Australia) 202.
